name: places/ChIJV2y1wNhZwokRZKAApf_zFZY
formattedAddress: 442 E 9th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 442 E 9th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: Gerardo is a true gem. I have curly hair and a lot of it and am a hairstylist loyalist. I have been commuting to my guy in LA for years. After years of complimenting a coworker on her hair I finally asked her for her hair stylist info and she said she has been following Gerardo for years through different salons and now here at his own spot. The salon is beautiful - perfectly located on ground level in wonderful neighborhood. It’s super clean, small, and personal as it’s just him cutting and washing hair. What I loved about him is the amount of attention he took to really understanding what I want. Took every detail I said for consideration and asked questions along the way if it was how i liked it, how i was use to my previous stylist doing it. I also went into it with a “surprise me” / not too prescriptive attitude and he did beautiful work on the cut. He’s very considerate and is easy going. Will talk as little or as much as you want. Super happy and will be back.

originalText.text:
I’ve been going to Gerardo for years and I’m so happy he opened his own salon! He is a fabulous stylist with accessible pricing— practically unheard of in nyc!!!!

Celeste is newly renovated, gorgeous, bright, and clean. Gerardo went out of the way to make everything extremely covid-safe— in addition to hygiene and his double masking, the studio is private and only allows one customer at a time!

Gerardo is a genuinely amazing person and I feel lucky to know him and be his client ❤️❤️ seriously book now you won’t regret it!!!

originalText.text:
Where do I start! Got my hair styled by Gerardo over two years ago and came back to find him in his new salon on the lower east side. Incredible stylist and one who really takes into account all that you want and puts his heart and soul into making you look fab! Couldn’t have asked for a more talented and creative stylist! Thank you for getting all the orange and red tones out of my hair and giving me the most incredible color that blends magnificently!

The salons modern aesthetic is beautiful - helps with the getting the creative juices flowing :)

originalText.text: Firstly, clean and pristine salon. Secondly, Gerardo is an artist! He consistently offers amazing, personalized service and is never rushed.  You are the only client in the studio and all his attention goes to you! He is always very accommodating and dedicated to his clients. Five stars!

text.text: Firstly, clean and pristine salon. Secondly, Gerardo is an artist! He consistently offers amazing, personalized service and is never rushed.  You are the only client in the studio and all his attention goes to you! He is always very accommodating and dedicated to his clients. Five stars!

originalText.text: Gerardo spent 90 minutes trimming my hair with a razor blade and gave me a spectacular hair style that received many compliments at home and at work.
